ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 145
ygData.msgSnippet: Brother Tsin, I am inclined to agree with you. Another thing to consider is the server one plays on. Older servers tend to have a greater abundance of high
ygData.messageBody:
Brother Tsin,

I am inclined to agree with you. Another thing to consider is the server one
plays on. Older servers tend to have a greater abundance of high level items
available at a lower cost than newer servers. I have experienced this on
Fennin
Ro. A few of the items that our level 28 monk wears are items that I also
wear.
Many of which I have acquired recently at what I would consider low prices. I
had the good fortune to purchase a Serpentine Bracer for 225 platinums.
Because
I spent much of my early time hunting wisps and recent levels hunting
gargoyles, I have found myself with more than a few platinums to spend on
items. And I have worked on my tailoring and brewing skills for some time,
so I
have a few cured silk pieces and the Gauntlets of Wu. Now if only I could find
a pair of those obsidian bead hoops as well, I could better improve some of my
other trade skills : )

In Quellious's name,

Manjushri,
Bearer of the Red Sash of the Ashen Order
(Fennin Ro but soon to be elsewhere)


At 10:14 AM 1/24/00 -0800, you wrote:
>From: Guillaume Voizard <gvoizard@...>
>
>Mmmh, what are you talking about ? I really think that equipment can be
>obtained at around 30. If you camp a lot of valuable items and you trade
>them well, you can easily have that (Sol A ?!). Don't jump on conclusions
>too fast please.
>
>Tsin Suchiko
>38th rank, Tunare.
>
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Amish Bob [mailto:zoku@...]

>
>
